column1: Banksy is an anonymous England-based street artist and political activist known for satirical and subversive graffiti art in public spaces.  Their identity remains unknown despite international fame.  Banksy's work often critiques consumerism
column4: using stencils and other techniques.  Their art has been displayed in galleries and sold for high prices
column5: but they also create works spontaneously in urban environments.  The secretive nature of their work and identity contributes to their mystique and impact.
